TRlongform<-as.data.table(melt(TRrespparam$param))

id.vars and measure.vars are internally guessed when both are 'NULL'. All non-numeric/integer/logical type columns are considered id.vars, which in this case are columns [cat]. Consider providing at least one of 'id' or 'measure' vars in future.
